Topic.Title: Reply to PM when forum user is not accepting PMs

Posts.EditableText:
I received a PM from someone, and when I tried to reply was told he/she was not accepting PMs.

What is the etiquette in that situation? Do I just ignore it?

Does the forum warn users when they send PMs that they cannot receive them?
Posts.HTML:
I received a PM from someone, and when I tried to reply was told he/she was not accepting PMs.

What is the etiquette in that situation? Do I just ignore it?

Does the forum warn users when they send PMs that they cannot receive them?
